name: Too much UI!
description:
A Sci-Fi Arena Shooter with Quake-Inspired movement in which you get more powerful very quickly, however at a great price- Your Screen-space!

A game by Mateusz Kindraczuk and Rasmus Skeppstam.

Controls:

WASD - Directional Movement

Mouse - Look

Mouse1 - Shoot

1, 2, 3 - Switch Weapons
